title: Can we nerf gragas already? jesus...
body: Just nerf this champion....he is everywhere...nobody cant deny that this champ is broken atm and he need nerfs

Because he wasn't a problem until he got buffs lol. Gragas wasn't worth complaining about before. Now he is, because he's not the same champion he was a few months back.
I didn't realize having your slow slight increase, 50 more damage to minions with one ability and a 30% decrease of damage to minions to another would cause a champion to suddenly become broken.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oe51ad4E,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2015-05-10T01:56:39.301+0000)
>
> I didn't realize having your slow slight increase, 50 more damage to minions with one ability and a 30% decrease of damage to minions to another would cause a champion to suddenly become broken.

His total buffs were:
- Barrel Roll slow increased by 10% at all ranks (15% increase if left to charge) - these are significant amounts, particularly for a jungler because it increases lockdown potential and reduces the ability for the enemy champ to escape a gank
- Drunken Rage damage to monsters buffed by 50 - not a huge change, it increases clear speed but not greatly
- Base mana increased by 100 - huge buff, massively increases the amount he can do early gank-wise, clear-wise and everything else

Sure none of the buffs were insane but he got improved in three different areas, ALL of which are particularly beneficial for a jungler. Combine that with Cinderhulk being very strong and you just cannot compare him to the champion he used to be. 

There are a lot of cases where people complain about champions that were considered weak at one point and hadn't got changes to make them better - a good example of that is Cho'Gath, who has received only one small change and largely has the same itemisation he used to have, yet is suddenly considered too strong. But Gragas isn't one of those cases, he is significantly better than he was a few months ago and if you don't believe that then I think you fail to see the power of his buffs. Three separate buffs and significantly changed itemisation can do huge amounts for any champion.

I mean even if you do want to put down his solo q banrate to people playing him in the LCS - there is a good reason Gragas jungle is in the competitive meta now, but wasn't before.
Then I assume we are just going to ignore the nerf that came along that nerfed his damage to minions from his Q because reasons, but whatever.
